0.Text:
Zen Pulse's damage and healing is increased by {1}% each time Soothing Mist heals, up to {2} times. 

When your Soothing Mist channel ends, this effect is canceled.

You focus the assault on this target, increasing their damage taken by {1}% for {2} sec.  Each unique player that attacks the target increases the damage taken by an additional {3}%, stacking up to {4} times.

Your melee attacks refresh the duration of Focused Assault.

When you kill an enemy, you summon a Healing Sphere, healing you for {1} when you walk through it.

When you kill an enemy with Blackout Kick, you have a {2}% chance to summon a Chi Sphere, granting {3} Chi when you walk through it.

Attacking new challengers with Tiger Palm fills you with the spirit of Xuen, granting you {1}% haste for {2} sec. 

This effect cannot occur more than once every {3} sec per target.
Your Blackout Kicks strike {1} targets and have an additional {2}% chance to reset the cooldown of your Rising Sun Kick while within your Faeline Stomp.
After casting Essence Font or Faeline Stomp, your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, and Rising Sun Kick heal an injured ally within {1} yds for {2}% of the damage done. Lasts {3} sec.

1.Text: After casting Essence Font or Faeline Stomp, your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, and Rising Sun Kick heal up to {1} injured allies within {2} yds for {3}% of the damage done, split evenly among them. Lasts {4} sec.

0.Text: Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by {1} sec. This effect can only occur once every {2} sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by {1}, maximum Energy by {2}, and your Energy regeneration by {3}%.
Bonedust Brew's Shadow damage or healing is increased by {1}%, and when Bonedust Brew deals Shadow damage or healing, its cooldown is reduced by {2} sec.
Guard the {1} closest players within {2} yards for {3} sec, allowing you to Stagger {4}% of damage they take.
Your abilities reset Faeline Stomp {1}% more often. While within Faeline Stomp, your Tiger Palms strike twice and your Spinning Crane Kick heals {2} nearby allies for {3}% of the damage done.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by {1}%.
Breath of Fire: Periodic damage increased by {2}%, and damage reduction increased by {3}%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by {4} additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to {5} additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for {6} sec.
Strike with a blast of Chi energy, dealing {1} Physical damage and granting Shuffle for {2} sec.

1.Text:
Kick with a blast of Chi energy, dealing {1} Physical damage.

Reduces the cooldown of Rising Sun Kick and Fists of Fury by {2} sec when used.

2.Text: Kick with a blast of Chi energy, dealing {1} Physical damage.

0.Text: Stagger duration increased by {1} sec, causing Staggered damage to instead be applied over {2} sec.

Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for {1} sec. Your abilities have a {2}% chance to affect the target a second time at {3}% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

Spinning Crane Kick refunds {4} Chi when striking enemies with your Bonedust Brew active.

1.Text:
Hurl a brew created from the bones of your enemies at the ground, coating all targets struck for {1} sec. Your abilities have a {2}% chance to affect the target a second time at {3}% effectiveness as Shadow damage or healing.

Your abilities have a low chance to cast Bonedust Brew at your target's location.

0.Text:
When a hit deals more than {1}% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by {2}% for {3} sec.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing {1} Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Your Armor is increased by {1}% and Stamina increased by {2}%.
Life Cocoon's cooldown is reduced by {1} sec, but its absorb amount is reduced by {2}%. When Life Cocoon expires, it releases a burst of mist that restores {3} health to {4} nearby allies.

0.Text: Weapons of Order calls forth Niuzao, the Black Ox to assist you for {1} sec.

Reduces all damage taken by {1}%.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing {1} damage.

Drinking from Brews has a {1}% chance to coat the Monk with Celestial Flames for {2} sec.

While Celestial Flames is active, Spinning Crane Kick applies Breath of Fire and Breath of Fire reduces the damage affected enemies deal to you by an additional {3}%.
You have a chance equal to your critical strike chance to be healed for an additional {1}% of the amount healed.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to {1} nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for {2} over {3} sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by {4}%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to {5} targets within {6} yds, absorbing {7} damage for {8} sec.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for {1} sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal {2}% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to {1} yds forward, dealing {2} Nature damage to all enemies, and {3} healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing reduced beyond {4} targets.


Chi Burst generates {5} Chi per enemy target damaged, up to a maximum of {6}.
